### Artifex Spring 2022

Welcome to Artifex!



```{r}

t = mdy("1/24/2022")

Week_of = c(t, t + (1:7 * 7))

Topics = c("Regression I (Estimation)",
  "R fundamentals - functions",
  "Regression II (Inference)",
  "Github and R",
  "Regression III (Prediction)",
  "Exploratory Data Analysis",
  "Regression IV (Diagnostics)",
  "Spring Break!")

syll = data.frame("Week" = Week_of, Topic = Topics, Deliverables = c("Exercises 1", rep("TBD", 6), "Nada")) 

kbl(syll) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))

```
